channel.title: Infinite Ress Priest + Phys/Alch
channel.description: #### What happened? I was healing a confirmed priest. A princess was brought back to life and he was healed because of it. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I guess it was correct, but he was supposed to die, doesn't he? I mean, if not i think it's pretty broken #### Steps to reproduce: Priest revives someone, and gets healed that very night. It happened to me as Alchemist. Didn't try with Phys #### Comments:

item.title: Infinite Ress Priest + Phys/Alch
item.dc:creator: Brssps1
item.description:
Same thing happened with me in game. Talked on discord, not an intentional effect.

Read full topic

item.title: Infinite Ress Priest + Phys/Alch
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
Title was kinda misleading though.

Maybe you could say:

Healing cause Priest not to die when ressing.

Read full topic

item.title: Infinite Ress Priest + Phys/Alch
item.dc:creator: Dazaroc
item.description:
What happened?

I was healing a confirmed priest. A princess was brought back to life and he was healed because of it.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I guess it was correct, but he was supposed to die, doesn’t he? I mean, if not i think it’s pretty broken

Steps to reproduce:

Priest revives someone, and gets healed that very night. It happened to me as Alchemist. Didn’t try with Phys

Comments:

Read full topic
